name: Cursed Castle (PixelMetalWolf)
description:
My entry to Metroidvania Month 15

You are a brave adventurer who took upon himself to end an Evil Lord's  tyranny over the lands by entering his cursed castle to defeat him, beware as he raised a powerful undead army to protect his domain. You start with your trusty shortsword, but who knows you might find some useful items throughout your journey !

Gameplay :

Keyboard :

Arrowkeys  = Move Left/right, and down to crouch

X = Attack

Spacebar = Jump/Accept in Menus

Controller :

D Pad = Move Left/right, and down to crouch

Xbox X, Psx Square  = Attack

Xbox A, Psx Cross = Jump/Accept in Menus

Credits :

All art assets, code, music and sfx, done solo during the jam.

Software Used :

Godot engine, Blender, Gimp, LMMS,

External Sources :

- Genny VST for LMMS

- Kenia Font from Google Fonts

And that's about it, I couldn't implement all i wanted to make it in time but hopefully you'll enjoy the game  ^_^
